hadith: The best of you are those who learn the Quran and teach it.
The strong believer is better and more beloved to Allah than the weak believer, while there is good in both.
Whoever believes in Allah and the Last Day, let him speak good or remain silent.
The most beloved of deeds to Allah are those that are most consistent, even if small.

arabic: مَن لا يشكر الناس لا يشكر الله
transliteration: Man la yashkur an-naas la yashkur Allah
translation: He who does not thank people has not thanked Allah.
